seed_pair.target: ¿Cuál de esos lugares crees que es el más interesante?
seed_pair.known: Which of those places do you think is the most interesting?

S0482: La única esperanza real es que no son serios.
The only real hope is that they're not serious.
S0483: La vida no es fácil pero no está destinada a ser fácil.
Life isn't easy but it's not meant to be easy.
S0484: Está destinada a ser un desafío.
It's meant to be a challenge.
S0485: Nada me haría más feliz que escapar.
Nothing would make me happier than to get away.
S0486: Creo que tus ojos son hermosos.
I think your eyes are beautiful.
S0488: Está al otro lado de esa línea amarilla.
It's on the other side of that yellow line.
S0489: Si no me haces una taza de café fuerte ahora mismo.
If you don't make me a strong cup of coffee right now.
S0490: Entonces nunca confiaré en nadie nunca más.
Then I will never trust anyone ever again.
S0491: Me encanta la forma en que intentas ayudar.
I love the way you try to help.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
